testimonio1: Excellent experience in creating my website. We worked remotely without any problem. For his dedication, sensitivity and professionalism. I recommend it 100%, my website was better than I dreamed it, THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
testimonio2: An impeccable, professional and prompt work.
testimonio3: I am happy and calm because what I wanted was fully achieved. Thank you very much to all the team that has lived up to a great service.
testimonio4: Our expectations were more than met. The work was complex and was accomplished with professionalism, great dedication and excellent communication.
home1par: My name is Alfredo L'Huissier. I am a software developer with more than 10 years of expierence working remotely. I specialize in applications and websites, with a particular focus on creating novel and memorable user experiences.
skills1par: My name is Alfredo L'Huissier. I am a software developer with more than 10 years of expierence working remotely. I specialize in web sites and applications, with a particular focus on creating novel and memorable user experiences. I can create microservices to solve client specific problems, quickly deploy a web site or landing page, manage a database or harness the potential and flexibility of progressive web applications, thus being able to adapt to many different scenarios.
skills2par: I am currently developing software for companies independently, and feel particularly attracted to projects with creative approaches, seeking to innovate both in their designs (UI/UX), and in the way they boost people's productivity.
resumen-alquimia: SPA (Single Page Application) based on VueJS and Vuetify, which allows navigating without the need to reload pages. Full page scrolling (fullpage.js) with parallax in portfolio. Hosted in Firebase Hosting.
resumen-og: Website for a service company, made with customized Wordpress with CSS and PHP. Simple content management for the client side thanks to Wordpress back end. Contains various forms, packages, media and dynamic content.
categorias-beatup: Web application, marketplace, ecommerce, streaming, music
resumen-beatup: Web application that works as a marketplace and streaming platform for producers, beatmakers, and urban artists. Purchase and sale of songs through different means of payment, with promotion and protection of copyright. Programmed with Vue on the frontend, Firebase for the management and flow of users, and Laravel/PHP for the massive management of audio files and different microservices. Integration with different means of payment (Webpay) thanks to Payku and its platform for creating marketplaces.
resumen-trap2day: Music blog for urban artists from Latin America. Built with Wordpress and customized with pieces of Javascript and CSS code.
resumen-mrclick: Internet commerce application built with Shopify and Liquid. Shopify has an extensive and well-documented API for making customized plugins and apps that solve customer-specific problems. This work includes custom microservices made in PHP to calculate custom rates and webhooks that help notify various shipping services, and the automation of billing system and accounting system.
resumen-makine: Informative website offering health services. Contact form connected to email. Easily modifiable design thanks to Elementor plugin.
resumen-l-vk: Catalog and property search customized with Wordpress and niche specific plugins. Connected to Google Maps, with video and responsive design.
resumen-casa: Blog/podcast type website. Ideal application for Wordpress, with a publication management system, easy integration with soundcloud and responsive design.
resumen-abc: Food catalog for delivery and sales. Produced with Wordpress and inventory and catalog system plugins. Google maps and direct buttons for whatsapp and social networks.
resumen-kiwen: Ecommerce site powered by Wordpress and Woocommerce. Integrated with Webpay payment system. Shopping cart, favorites and user registration system.
resumen-idea: Digital identity of the IDEa experimental dance company. Made with Wordpress, taking advantage of its content management features. Modern videos and galleries.
resumen-balamboo: Company of design and development of website and web applications, search engine optimization (SEO) and digital marketing.
resumen-temac: Company dedicated to the import of machinery and products for hydraulic installations, sanitation and mining.
resumen-rubik: 3D implementation of a Rubik's cube, with full game logic and turn counting. Programmed with Javascript and ThreeJS library for handling 3D in the browser. Compatible with VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented reality). Hosted in Firebase Hosting.
